title: Grasping
description: Actively gripping something; for example, grabbing a teammate’s uniform or helmet cover, or holding hands. The $grasping:grasping$ Skater’s arm, from the hand up to (but not including) the shoulder, is considered to be part of the “$grasp:grasping$.” The teammate is not considered part of the $grasp:grasping$, unless the teammate is independently $grasping:grasping$.
